long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Date to Date Calculator is a Chrome extension that offers two main functionalities:

1. Calculate the number of days between two dates;
2. Determine the resulting date when adding or subtracting a specific number of days from a given date

This tool is useful for quickly performing date-related calculations directly in your browser.
